Safiatou Thiam bụ dọkịta na-ahụ maka ahụike ọha na eze na Senegal, ọkachamara na HIV / AIDS na onye bụbu Minista na-ahụ Maka ahụike na mgbochi ọrịa na gọọmentị Cheikh Hadjibou Soumaré.O mechara bụrụ onye isi odeakwụkwọ nke CNLS National Council against AIDS

O nwetara nzere doctorate ya na Public Health 1995 na Mahadum Cheikh Anta Diop na Dakar, na thesis akpọrọ Le SIDA en milieu chirurical : Connaissances, attitudes et pratiques (n'asụsụ Bekee: AIDS in the surgical arena: Knowledge, attitudes and practises)
Ọ gụsịrị nzere Master of Science na Institute of Tropical Medicine na Antwerp n'afọ 1997

Ọ gụsịrị ọtụtụ diplọma ọkachamara na Dakar na France, yana DEA na Santé publique et pays en développement (English: Public Health and Developing Countries) na l'Université Pierre et Marie Curie (Paris VI) n'afọ 2001.
Na Conseil national de la lutte contre le Sida (CNLS) (n'asụsụ Bekee: National Council for the Fight Against AIDS), ọ na-eduzi mmemme nke Fonds mondial de lutte contre cette pandémie
N'afọ 2007, a nabatara ya dị ka onye nhazi nke Joint United Nations Programme on HIV / AIDS program na Senegal
N'afọ 2014 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na GMS / OASYS Grant Management Solutions
Mali Institute of Health and Development.
Na Mahadum Paris VI ọ nwetara Diploma of Thorough (DEA) na "Health Public and Developing Countries" (2001)
Na Mahadum Cheikh Anta Diop nke Dakar, ọ nwetara asambodo nke ọmụmụ pụrụ iche (CES) na ọrịa na-efe efe na nke na-ekpo ọkụ (2001)
Na Institute of Tropical Medicine Antwerp na Belgium ọ nwetara Master of Science: Degree in Tropical Biomedical Sciences (epidemiology and disease control option) (n'afọ 1997)
Na Paul Correa Institute of Dakar Diploma ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Planning and Organization of control of STDs and AIDS in developing countries (1998)
Na Fournier Institute Paris International, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Diploma Course on Sexually Transmitted Diseases (STDs)
Na AIDS Institute Fournier na Paris (n'afọ 1998), Mahadum Cheikh Anta Diop nke Dakar State ọ nwetara Doctorate Medicine (1995).
